segments.text: This Olympic park is so big !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Now we are in the Olympic stadium , the center of this park .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Splendid ! When is it gonna be finished ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The whole stadium is to be finished this June .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many seats are there in the stand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , there are 5000 seats in total .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn â€™ t know it would be so big !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is ! Look there , those are the tracks . And the jumping pit is over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah ... I see . Hey , look the sign here , No climbing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We put many signs with English translations for foreign visitors .
segments.speaker: S2
